reviews.subject: Data Structures
reviews.review: Challenging but rewarding course. The assignments really helped solidify the concepts.

reviews.subject: Operating Systems
reviews.review: Tough grading and fast-paced lectures, but learned a lot about how systems work.

reviews.subject: Computer Networks
reviews.review: The professor was engaging and explained networking concepts very clearly.

reviews.subject: Machine Learning
reviews.review: Very hands-on with practical projects, though the math was intense.

reviews.subject: Databases
reviews.review: Clear structure, relevant content, and helpful teaching assistant support.

reviews.subject: Web Development
reviews.review: Fun and practical course, though some parts felt rushed.

reviews.subject: Artificial Intelligence
reviews.review: Content was theoretical with not much coding, but lectures were insightful.

reviews.subject: Software Engineering
reviews.review: Group project was a great learning experience. Lectures were a bit dry though.

reviews.subject: Computer Graphics
reviews.review: Exciting visuals and challenging coding assignments. Loved it!

reviews.subject: Cybersecurity
reviews.review: A lot of real-world scenarios discussed. Could use more hands-on labs.
